maple: A023421 := proc(n)    option remember;    if n = 0 then        1;    else        procname(n-1)+add(procname(k)*procname(n-2-k), k=3..n-2) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 01 2015
mathematica: Clear[ a ]; a[ 0 ]=1; a[ n_Integer ] := a[ n ]=a[ n-1 ]+Sum[ a[ k ]*a[ n-2-k ], {k, 3, n-2} ];
